title: The honorable historie of frier Bacon, and frier Bongay As it was plaid by her Maiesties seruants. Made by Robert Greene Master of Arts.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
publisher: Printed [by Adam Islip] for Edward White, and are to be sold at his shop, at the little north dore of Poules, at the signe of the Gun,
